alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, western Madison, southwestern Lowndes, southeastern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Madison to 16 miles southwest of Perry. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Quitman, Perry, Boston, Greenville, Alma, Dills, Hells Half Acre, Grooverville, Ebb, Lamont, Everett, Hamburg, Eridu, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Scanlon and Lovett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
